Package UILib

Class Checkbox

java.lang.Object
UILib.Button
UILib.Checkbox
public class Checkbox extends Button
This allows to display a checkbox (the tag @example followed by the name of an example included in folder 'examples' will automatically include the example in the javadoc.)
